name: Breakin Block
description:
"Breakin Block" is a "breakout" type game consists on destroying blocks by ball flying in different directions. Deflect ball using racket, to avoid border touch by ball. Gather high combos by destroying blocks to activate special amplifications, upgrade self, play in several modes, gain achievements and track your game progress with statistics menu!

arrow keys / A, D - move
left Ctrl / left mouse button - release ball
Q - activate magnetic amplification (only if combo counter has a blue, green or red color)
W - activate cloning amplification (only if combo counter has green or red color)
E - activate ballistic amplification (only if combo counter has a red color)
Esc / P - pause game

Available in two languages: Polish and English.
Also available on Kongregate and Newgrounds!

Powered by Unity.
